setPasswordAccount.title: Set Password
setPasswordAccount.description: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (e.g., !@#$%^&*).

error.characters: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
error.lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
error.number: Password must contain at least 1 number
error.symbol: Password must contain at least 1 special character

deleteAccount.error: You are the owner of the clan
